headline: Colombia’s Trump May Be Headed for the Presidential Palace
snippet: The Colombian establishment is lining up behind Rodolfo Hernández, a populist businessman with an incendiary streak, to defeat the leftist former rebel Gustavo Petro.
abstract: The Colombian establishment is lining up behind Rodolfo Hernández, a populist businessman with an incendiary streak, to defeat the leftist former rebel Gustavo Petro.

headline: What to Cook This Week
snippet: Make jalapeño grilled pork chops and root beer rickeys for Memorial Day, and walnut picadillo or merguez later in the week.
abstract: Make jalapeño grilled pork chops and root beer rickeys for Memorial Day, and walnut picadillo or merguez later in the week.

headline: Gun in Texas Shooting Came From Company Known for Pushing Boundaries
snippet: Daniel Defense, which makes military-style rifles, was an early adopter of direct-to-consumer marketing and has a history of running provocative ads.
abstract: Daniel Defense, which makes military-style rifles, was an early adopter of direct-to-consumer marketing and has a history of running provocative ads.
byline: By David Yaffe-Bellany and Jessica Silver-Greenberg

headline: America’s Human Sacrifices
snippet: Guns don’t kill people. Doors do.
abstract: Guns don’t kill people. Doors do.

headline: Trump’s Primary Losses Puncture His Invincibility
snippet: With many of Donald J. Trump’s endorsed candidates falling to defeat in recent primaries, some Republicans see an opening for a post-Trump candidate in 2024.
abstract: With many of Donald J. Trump’s endorsed candidates falling to defeat in recent primaries, some Republicans see an opening for a post-Trump candidate in 2024.
byline: By Shane Goldmacher and Maggie Haberman

headline: New York’s Most Generous Tax Break Could Bite the Dust
snippet: The State Legislature is unlikely to renew the 421a subsidy, which for decades has benefited nearly every large residential real estate project in the city.
abstract: The State Legislature is unlikely to renew the 421a subsidy, which for decades has benefited nearly every large residential real estate project in the city.

headline: Republican Governors Lose Their Dread of Trump
snippet: Gov. Brian Kemp of Georgia just crushed a Trump-backed challenger. Many of his counterparts are also in strong political shape. And some are openly opposing their party’s leader.
abstract: Gov. Brian Kemp of Georgia just crushed a Trump-backed challenger. Many of his counterparts are also in strong political shape. And some are openly opposing their party’s leader.
